headline: Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) Launches Portable Always Flexfoam at Coachella 2025 as Official Period Care Partner
summary: Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) recently announced the launch of the Always Pocket Flexfoam, marking its entry as the first-ever period care partner at Coachella 2025. This innovative product release, alongside the strategic festival partnership, likely played a role in P&G's 3.5% price increase over the past month. Meanwhile, during this period, the major indexes experienced varied movements amid the Federal Reserve’s continued assessment of economic expansion, keeping interest rates unchanged,...

headline: Downy Partners with Operation Warm
summary: CINCINNATI, March 20, 2025--This March and April when customers buy Downy liquid fabric softener at Dollar General, they’re not just freshening up laundry—they’re also supporting a great cause!

headline: My Dividend Stock Portfolio: New February Dividend Record - 100 Holdings With 11 Buys
summary: February investments fell below $1,000, mainly in BDCs like Owl Rock Capital and Ares Capital, boosting annual dividend income by $77.
